List Central Help

If you are looking for help on how to use List Central, you have come to the right place. Below is a collection of questions with corresponding answers to help with all the various features on List Central. This help section is a perpetual work in progress, if you cannot find what you are looking for let us know, so that we can continue to improve these help pages.

  • How do I create lists?
  • What are list groups?
  • What are status sets?
  • How fo I add items to my lists?
  • How do I share more about myself
  • How do I change my avatar?
  • What are Gravatars?
  • How do I change my theme?
  • How do I change my email preferences?
  • How do I change my privacy settings?
  • How do I change my basic information?
  • Where do I send questions, comments and suggestions?
  • Why can't I find my Flickr images through the Creative Commons images feature?
  • How does the edit in place functionality work?

If you cannot find what you are looking for here, you might be able to find your questions has been answered in the frequently asked questions. If now, then feel free to contact us.
